痚字的基本解释

痚
xiāo
哮喘。

痚字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiāo］
［《集韻》虚交切，平爻，曉。］
(1)见“痚瘶”。
(2)病名，气喘。

痚字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【疒字部】　痚； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页773第25
【集韻】【類篇】?虛交切，音囂。痚瘶，喉病。【正字通】一說久咳不已，連喘，腰背相引，坐寢有音者。俗名為痚病。

痚字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
痚字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [xiāo]
["Jiyun" imaginary intersection, flat line, dawn. ]
(1) See "皚瘶".
(2) The name of the disease, asthma.
asthma
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Concentration] [The Department of Sui Characters] 　痚; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 773 25
[Ji Yun] [Class Chapter]? Virtual intersecting, sound clamor. Sickness, throat disease. [Zhengzitong] When talking about prolonged coughing, wheezing repeatedly, with back and back, there is a sound when sitting and sleeping. Commonly known as rash.
